title: Mission Revival in Claremont blends period charm, modern flair
text:
Photo: Liz Rusby/the Grubb Co. A winding exterior staircase leads to the arched, covered entry of 19 Hillcrest Road in Berkeley. A winding exterior staircase leads to the arched, covered entry of...
